snippet: Amir Aziz Ali Akbari of Iran was stripped of his world title and barred for life because he tested positive for anabolic steroids at the world championships in September.
abstract: Amir Aziz Ali Akbari of Iran is stripped of his wrestling world title and barred for life because he tested positive for anabolic steroids at the world championships in September 2013.
lead_paragraph: Amir Aziz Ali Akbari of Iran was stripped of his world title and barred for life because he tested positive for anabolic steroids at the world championships in September.
